item.title: Errandy Flutter Application
item.description: Software Design Document Title: Errandy Author: Pownthep Laokhunthot Reviewer:Pownthep Laokhunthot Created date: 24 of April 2019 Overview A mobile application that will allow employer to post jobs and find workers around local areas on demand. The application will also provide contact details to the worker and as well as direction to get to the work site as specified by the employer. Context Young people in modern society often find themselves with nothing to do outside of studying and going out with friends.
